summary: Demo case for LawPro.ai. This represents a fictional case involving a car accident that causes the passenger to break their left arm and worsen a slipped disc. There is a pre-existing diagnosis for the slipped disc, but the accident is found to be the cause of the broken arm.
note:
- passenger in a car that was hit by a drunk driver.
- drunk driver was found to be at fault.
- severely broken left arm with major, permanent disability.
- They had a previous neck surgery that was re-injured in the crash.

caseFiles.name: DemoMedicalRecord.pdf
caseFiles.summary: Demo case file for LawPro.ai. This is a fictional medical record for a patient involved in a car accident, receiving surgery and physical therapy.

events.name: Diagnosis
events.summary: Doctor examined x-rays and diagnosed a 4mm bulging disc at C5-C6.

events.name: Pre-existing condition
events.data: Pre-existing diagnosis for a slipped disc in neck.
events.summary: Patient has a pre-existing diagnosis for a slipped disc in neck.

events.name: Motor Vehicle Accident
events.data: compound fractures to the left arm, neck injury
events.summary: Motor vehical accident at the corner of Littel Rest and Poplar Street.EMT response from North Cassandra Fire Department. Dr. Omar Shanahan, EMT was the EMT on scene.Patient was transported to Littel Inc Emergency Hospital.

events.name: Pain Statement
events.data: Broken left arm, major neck pain, signification back, left knee, and head pain.
events.summary: Chief complaint: broken left arm, major neck pain, signification back, left knee, and head pain.

events.name: Pain Score
events.summary: Pain score: 9/10

events.name: Doctor Visit
events.data: Patient stabilized and prepped for surgery.
events.summary: Transported to Littel Inc Emergency Hospital by North Cassandra Fire Department.Triage by Stuart Franecki, RN. Immediate xrays and surgery scheduled.

events.name: Pain Medication
events.summary: Pain medication administered. 100ml of morphine.

events.name: Alcohol
events.data: Regular drinker, including just before accident.
events.summary: Patient reported drinking 4 beers before accident. 3-6 drinks/week

events.name: Drugs
events.summary: Patient reported smoking marijuana 1-2 times per week.

events.name: Imaging Event
events.data: X-Ray results: multiple compound and spiral fractures to the left arm. 6mm bulging disc at C5-C6.
events.summary: X-Ray of the left arm finds multiple compound and spiral fractures. X-Ray of the neck finds 6mm bulging disc at C5-C6, but date of onset inconclusive.

events.name: Diagnosis
events.data: Diagnosis: multiple fractures to left arm. 6mm bulging disc at C5-C6.
events.summary: Diagnosed by surgeon with multiple fractures to left arm after reviewing x-rays and a 6mm bulging disc at C5-C6..

events.name: Pain Score
events.summary: Pain score: 7/10

events.name: Surgery for broken left arm
events.data: Surgery scheduled for broken left arm.
events.summary: Surgery scheduled for broken left arm.

events.name: Surgery
events.summary: Surgery for broken left arm. Surgery successful.

events.name: Discharged
events.data: Discharged: prescription for pain medication, physical therapy, and follow-up appointment with surgeon.
events.summary: Discharged from emergency room. Patient given prescription for pain medication, physical therapy, and follow-up appointment with surgeon.

events.name: Pain Score
